form.deleteAccountSuccessMessage: Sad to see you're going away :( We would pray to have you as our user later on!!!

hasLifeInsurance.label: Life Insurance
hasLifeInsurance.helperText: Do you have life insurance? We need to know in order to better indicate your financial health

hasMedicalInsurance.helperText: Do you have medical insurance? We need it for same purpose as life insurance knowledge.
